headlines.description: Manchester City barely got out of second gear as they easily beat bottom club Huddersfield Town to close the gap on leaders Liverpool.

video.headline: Huddersfield 0-3 Man City: City blank struggling Terriers

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlight (Huddersfield 0-3 Man City: City blank struggling Terriers) 2019/01/20 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: City ease to comfortable win at Huddersfield

headlines.description: Tottenham struggled in their first game without Harry Kane but edged past struggling Fulham thanks to a stoppage time winner from Harry Winks.

video.headline: Fulham 1-2 Tottenham: Winks wins it at the last

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlight (Fulham 1-2 Tottenham: Winks wins it at the last) 2019/01/20 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs need last-minute winner to edge past Fulham
